DOC.brief_title: Effects Motivational Interviewing Self-Efficacy Standardized Low Back Pain Outcomes Patients With Chronic Back Pain ''
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot study evaluate impact MI self-efficacy outcome chronic low back pain . Design Prospective randomized , single blind pilot , control study . Patients refer E10 Spine Center contact study coordinator . The Coordinator meet potential participant , determine meet inclusion exclusion criterion , obtain informed consent , assess self-efficacy use Stanford Self efficacy instrument , use en bloc randomization self-efficacy experimental control group . They complete SF-12 , VAS pain scale , Roland Morris Disability questionnaire , question employment status 1 question satisfaction care . The experimental group ( goal n=20 ) treat physical therapist train motivational interviewing technique PhD sample session videotape validation purpose . The control group ( goal n=20 ) receive PT PT per normal standard care . Both experimental control group complete additional self-efficacy instrument prior leave . Six week patient participate motivational interview session mail repeat previously mention instrument include self-efficacy tool . Patients return complete instrument receive forty dollar . If effect size small , pilot study underpowered , clinically significant trend observe additional funding seek experimental control n expand 64 . Setting Tertiary academic medical center Participants Referrals Spine Center , large outpatient Physical Medicine Rehabilitation practice least three month chronic low back pain . Primary Outcome Measure Self-efficacy Managing Chronic disease 6-Item scale Main Outcome Measures Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire Pain VAS Satisfaction care question Disability status question SF-12 Exclusion Criteria Medical /legal involvement Active worker compensation Infection tumor spine Active systemic disease lumbar spine Multiple musculoskeletal problem require Treatment Patients receive 2 PT session Inclusion Criteria Three month low back pain Ability read , write speak English
